metadata.title: CVE-2014-5260 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The (1) mkxmltype and (2) mkdtskel scripts in XML-DT before 0.64 allowlocal users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a/tmp/_xml_##### temporary file.

criterions.comment: libxml-dt-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
